nodes.text: Gorma-Koss, which literally meant the Gormak Kingdom in the old Voss language, was a settlement on the planet Voss created deep within the lands of the Gormak. This massive city served as a home for tens of thousands of Gormak who had united their tribes into a sprawling expanse of huts, tents, high-tech defenses and amazing levels of technology that were situated at the base of an unnamed mountain by the time of the Cold War.

It was rumored that the city was led by a single powerful leader and the Gormak that dwell within it were organized for some great purpose. This was evident of the fact that they did not scavenge cast-off random technology but instead seemed to be searching for specific items and components as if they were gathering material for some unknown massive endeavor.
